title: Nautilus Statue
body:
When is the {{champion:111}} statue going to be strategically placed in the ocean, to help the ecological habitats of fish and other sea animals, btw this is for ocean week. Or has it already been placed and I missed it, I'm not sure. We earned the statue and it will help other animals as well as humans. Please do this Riot, unless you've already done it, it would be AMAZING.
{{champion:111}}

replies.body: When it's finished and riot has the permission to do so. these sort of things take time lmao.
